attributes.action: refrain, upon the retirement of the House of Commons Speaker, Michael Martin, from recommending to Her Majesty the Queen that he should be elevated to the peerage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Martin's incumbency as Speaker has been marked by a deterioration in both the behaviour of MPs and the public's regard for the House of Commons, to the extent that the nation has lost confidence in its elected assembly.  His behaviour does not deserve any reward and he is not a fit person to join the upper chamber.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
